mapper.select: select distinct menu.permission from user_role left join role_menu using (role_id) left join menu on role_menu.menu_id = menu.id where menu.delete_flag = 0 and menu.status = 0 and menu.menu_type in ('C', 'F') and user_role.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct menu.id, menu.parent_id, menu.menu_name, menu.path, menu.component, menu.visible, menu.status, ifnull(menu.permission, '') as permission, menu.is_frame, menu.menu_type, menu.icon, menu.order_number, menu.create_time from menu where menu.delete_flag = 0 and menu.status = 0 and menu.menu_type in ('C', 'M') order by menu.parent_id, menu.order_number
